casebody.data:
MANUFACTURERS’ NAT. BANK OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. LORD et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. March 16, 1894.) Action by the Manufacturers’. National Bank of New York against Heaekiah F. Lord and another.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and O’BRIEN and FOLLETT, JJ.

John Cummins, for appellants. G. E. P. Howard, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
